data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Priyaja, P., Kumar, A. Biju, Devi, S. Suvarna (2019): A collection of crabs (Crustacea, Brachyura) from the southwestern coast of India, with a discussion of the systematic position of Nectopanope Wood-Mason in Wood-Mason & Alcock, 1891 (Euryplacidae). ZooKeys 818: 1-24, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.818.32108, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.818.32108
